site_name: SAINT VINCENT COLLEGE LIFE SCIENCE RESEARCH LAB

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC conducted reviews of the facility's program for humane care and use of animals on June 4, 2024 and June10,
2025. There was a twelve month span of time between the two reviews.
The IACUC must review the animal use program, at least once every six months, in order to assure the proper care and
welfare of animals.
A review of the program for humane care and use of animals must be performed by the IACUC at least once every six
months.
Correct by January 9, 2026.

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The IACUC conducted inspections of the animal facilities on June 4, 2024 and June10, 2025. There was a twelve month
span of time between the two inspections.
The IACUC must inspect the animal facilities, at least once every six months, in order to assure the proper housing and
general welfare of animals.
An inspection of the facility must be performed by the IACUC at least once every six months.
Correct by January 9, 2026.
No regulated animals present at this time.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an IACUC Representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(1) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC conducted reviews of the facility's program for humane care and use of animals on June 4, 2024 and June10, 
2025. There was a twelve month span of time between the two reviews. 
The IACUC must review the animal use program, at least once every six months, in order to assure the proper care and 
welfare of animals. 
A review of the program for humane care and use of animals must be performed by the IACUC at least once every six 
months. 
Correct by January 9, 2026. 
2.31(c)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The IACUC conducted inspections of the animal facilities on June 4, 2024 and June10, 2025. There was a twelve month 
span of time between the two inspections. 
The IACUC must inspect the animal facilities, at least once every six months, in order to assure the proper housing and 
general welfare of animals. 
An inspection of the facility must be performed by the IACUC at least once every six months. 
Correct by January 9, 2026. 
 
No regulated animals present at this time.  
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with an IACUC Representative. 
 
 n
